simple.gui.component

Class SMenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JMenuBar
            • simple.gui.component.SMenuBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public final class SMenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Simplification of JMenus.
    Predefines:
    • File
      • Open...
      • Save...
      • Quit
    • Options
    • Tools
    • Help
      • Help
      • About

    Options can be combined by simply adding them together.
    Requires simple.util.App(simple.util.logging.*)
    Created: May 14, 2006
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
